TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SessionSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

summary.span: 定义包含数据与会话相关的安全标记。

span.span: Defines a security token that contains data associated with a session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 会话令牌存储与会话关联的用户 ，以及用于定义会话的其他参数;例如会话的开始时间和结束时间。A session token stores the of the user that is associated with a session as well as other parameters that define the session; for example the session start and end times. 在被动方案中， 从身份验证管道调用到 （SAM），以从表示经过身份验证的用户的 创建会话令牌。In passive scenarios, the calls into the (SAM) from the authentication pipeline to create a session token from the that represents the authenticated user. SAM 使用其配置的 来创建令牌并将其序列化为 cookie （并在后续请求中从 cookie 反序列化令牌）。The SAM uses its configured to create the token and to serialize it into a cookie (and to deserialize the token from a cookie on subsequent requests). SAM 使用其配置的 类的实例将 cookie 写回 HTTP 响应。The SAM uses an instance of its configured class to write the cookie back to the HTTP Response. 然后，将此 cookie 返回给客户端，并在后续的请求中，客户端可以提供 cookie，而不是向标识提供程序重新获取安全令牌。This cookie is then returned to the client and on subsequent requests the client can present the cookie rather than making a round trip back to the identity provider to re-obtain a security token. 有关会话如何与 WIF 操作的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 会话管理](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md)。For more information about how sessions operate with WIF, see [WIF Session Management](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md). 有关在 Web 场方案中使用会话的信息，请参阅[WIF 和 Web 场](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md)。For information about using sessions in Web farm scenarios, see [WIF and Web Farms](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md). 会话令牌可以在引用模式下运行。A session token can operate in either reference mode or not. 如果会话令牌不是在引用模式下操作，则会将整个令牌序列化为存储在客户端上的会话 cookie。If the session token is not operating in reference mode, the entire token is serialized into the session cookie that is stored on the client. 序列化会话令牌可能相当大，因此，存储在客户端上的 cookie 也可能非常就前往。The serialized session token can be quite large and thus the cookie stored on the client can also be quite sizeable. 在引用模式下，不会将整个会话令牌序列化为 cookie，而是将令牌存储在会话安全令牌缓存中，而只有用于生成从缓存中检索令牌所必需的密钥的信息存储在 cookie 中。In reference mode, rather than serializing the entire session token into the cookie, the token is stored in a session security token cache and only the information used to generate the key necessary to retrieve the token from the cache is stored in the cookie. 这样可以极大地减少 cookie 的大小。This can greatly reduce the size of the cookie. 会话令牌缓存由派生自 的类实现，缓存键由 类实现。The session token cache is implemented by a class derived from and the cache key is implemented by the class. 和 属性在 类中用于生成缓存密钥。The and properties are used in the class to generate the cache key. 属性确定会话令牌是否处于引用模式。The property determines whether the session token is in reference mode or not. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在引用模式下操作，Microsoft 建议为 global.asax.cs 文件中的 事件提供处理程序，并在 属性中传递的标记上设置 属性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 这将确保会话令牌在每个请求的引用模式下运行，并且优于仅设置会话身份验证模块上的 属性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module. WIF 提供的 类将会话令牌序列化为 WS 安全对话 `` 元素。The class provided with WIF serializes the session token as a WS-Secure Conversation `` element.

span.span: WIF Session Management
WIF and Web Farms

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`claimsPrincipal`| ||`null`| ||设置为生成的唯一 ID。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||| ||设置为生成的唯一 ID。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||| || 加上 属性。 plus the property.| ||`null`| ||包含生成的128位对称密钥。Contains a generated 128 bit symmetric key. **注意：** 默认实现不使用此属性。**Note:** The default implementation does not use this property. 签名和加密密钥由处理令牌的 应用的 cookie 转换决定。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.| ||| || 加上 属性。 plus the property.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`claimsPrincipal`| ||`context`| ||`contextId`| ||`endpointId`| ||设置为生成的唯一 ID。Set to a generated unique ID.| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||设置为由 `ValidFrom` 参数确定的 属性的值。Set to the value of the property as determined by the `ValidFrom` parameter.| ||由 `ValidTo` 参数确定的 属性的值。The value of the property as determined by the `ValidTo` parameter.| ||`null`| ||包含 `key` 的单个元素，如果 `key` `null`，则为生成的128位对称密钥。Contains single element that is either `key` or, if `key` is `null`, a generated 128 bit symmetric key. **注意：** 默认实现不使用此属性。**Note:** The default implementation does not use this property. 签名和加密密钥由处理令牌的 应用的 cookie 转换决定。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.| ||`validFrom` 参数的值，或者，如果 `validFrom` `null`，则为。The value of the `validFrom` parameter, or, if `validFrom` is `null`, .| ||`validFrom` 参数的值。The value of the `validFrom` parameter. 如果 `validFrom` `null`，则 属性的值（由 `validFrom` 参数确定）加上 属性。If `validFrom` is `null`, the value of the property (as determined by the `validFrom` parameter) plus the property.|

summary.span: 获取会话上下文标识符。

span.span: Gets the session context identifier.
The session context identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上下文标识符在所有会话令牌中是唯一的。The context identifier is unique across all session tokens. 类使用上下文 ID 和密钥生成来生成 中的令牌的密钥。The class uses both the context ID and the key generation to generate a key for the token in the . 类将此属性序列化为 `` 元素的 `` 子元素。The class serializes this property as the `` child element of the `` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅 方法的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndpointId As String
public: property System::String ^ EndpointId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取限定此标识范围的终点 ID。

span.span: Gets the ID of the endpoint to which this token is scoped.
The ID of the endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果 `null` 属性，则会按 类处理会话令牌的全局作用域。If the property is `null`, the session token is treated as globally scoped by the class. 这可能会带来潜在的安全风险。This can present a potential security risk.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPersistent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsPersistent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否保留此标记表示的 Cookie 的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cookie represented by this token is persistent.

value.span: 如果 cookie 为持久的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cookie is persistent; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true` 属性，则会将 cookie 编写为永久性 cookie。If the property is `true`, the cookie is written as a persistent cookie. 永久性 cookie 在关闭浏览器后保持有效状态，直到其过期。Persistent cookies remain valid after the browser is closed until they expire.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsReferenceMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsReferenceMode : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示引用安全令牌是否在会话模式下运行的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the session security token is operating in reference mode.

value.span: 如果标记在会话模式操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the token is operating in session mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在引用模式下，在序列化过程中生成一个简单的项目，令牌材料存储在与令牌处理程序关联的令牌缓存中。In reference mode, a simple artifact is produced during serialization and the token material is stored in the token cache that is associated with the token handler. 令牌缓存是派生自 的类的实例。The token cache is an instance of a class that derives from . 对于 Web 场方案，令牌缓存必须在场中的所有节点上运行。For Web Farm scenarios, the token cache must operate across all nodes in the farm. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在引用模式下操作，Microsoft 建议为 global.asax.cs 文件中的 事件提供处理程序，并在 属性中传递的标记上设置 属性。To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the property on the token passed in the property. 这将确保会话令牌在每个请求的引用模式下运行，并且优于仅设置会话身份验证模块上的 属性。This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the property on the Session Authentication Module.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyEffectiveTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime KeyEffectiveTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取此安全令牌有效的时间。

span.span: Gets the time instant from which the key in this token is valid.
The time instant from which the key is effective.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyExpirationTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime KeyExpirationTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取此安全令牌失效之后的有效的时间。

span.span: Gets the time instant after which the key in this token is no longer valid.
The time instant at which the key expires.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyGeneration As UniqueId
public: property System::Xml::UniqueId ^ KeyGeneration { System::Xml::UniqueId ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取该标记中用于密钥生成的标识符。

span.span: Gets the identifier for the key generation in this token.

value.span: 标记中生成密钥的唯一标识符。

span.span: The unique identifier for the key generation in this token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在会话令牌中是唯一的。The property is unique within a session token. 发出会话令牌时，它只有上下文 ID，可以通过 属性访问该 ID。When a session token is issued it has only a context ID, which is accessible through the property. 续订会话令牌后，会添加密钥生成。When the session token is renewed, the key generation is added. 类使用上下文 ID 和密钥生成来生成 中的令牌的密钥。The class uses both the context ID and the key generation to generate a key for the token in the . 类将此属性序列化为 `` 元素的 `` 子元素。The class serializes this property as the `` child element of the `` element. 有关详细信息，请参阅 方法的文档。For more information, see the documentation for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecureConversationVersion As Uri
public: property Uri ^ SecureConversationVersion { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 URI，标识用于序列化此会话安全令牌的 WS 安全会话的版本。

span.span: Gets a URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this session security token.

value.span: 一个 URI，标识用于序列化此令牌的 WS 安全会话的版本。

span.span: The URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类支持 WS 安全会话 Feb2005 和 WS 安全会话1.3。The base class supports WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 and WS-Secure Conversation 1.3. 这些版本的 WS 安全会话的 Uri 分别为 "" 和 ""。The URIs for these versions of WS-Secure Conversation are "" and "", respectively.

summary.span: 获取与此会话关联的键 。

span.span: Gets the keys associated with this session.

summary.span: 这通常是一个唯一密钥。

span.span: This is usually a single key.
The keys associated with the session.

value.span: 这通常是一个唯一密钥。

span.span: There is usually a single key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 默认实现不使用此属性。The default implementation does not use this property. 签名和加密密钥由处理令牌的 应用的 cookie 转换决定。Signing and encryption keys are dictated by the cookie transforms applied by the that processes the token.
